section.heading: Procurements.
section.text: Section 2-356.04 shall apply to procurements for architectural and engineering services, as that term is defined in § 2-351.04(3), to carry out the purposes of this chapter, however, the District may:

para.text: Set aside contracts for such services for certified business enterprises and certified joint ventures; or
Award preferences to certified business enterprises as provided in § 2-218.43 as part of the evaluation of statements of qualifications submitted in response to a request for qualifications.
